comments.body: Size of what does it return? `CalendarIntervalType`, `YearMonthIntervalType`, `DayTimeIntervalType` are returned as strings in rowSets.

`CalendarIntervalType` return it's `defaultSize` (4 + 4 + 8 = 16).
It seems `YearMonthIntervalType` and `DayTimeIntervalType` should return `defaultSize` too.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +132,136 @@  private def getColumnSize(typ: DataType): Option[Int] = typ match {
    case dt @ (BooleanType | _: NumericType | DateType | TimestampType |
               CalendarIntervalType | NullType | YearMonthIntervalType | DayTimeIntervalType) =>
      Some(dt.defaultSize)
    case CharType(n) => Some(n)

comments.body: It is by design. May be we should fix SPARK-31634 first. Another related issue: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-23359
Thanks for review @wangyum. SPARK-31634 talks about sql command, but this change affect thrift meta api. Can you clarify the relation between them?
